title: Getting Started with Python
content: Python is a powerful and beginner-friendly programming language. In this blog, we explore the basics and how to set up your first project.

title: Understanding WebSockets
content: WebSockets provide real-time communication between a client and server. This blog explains how they work and why they are useful.

title: Django vs Flask: Which One to Choose?
content: Django and Flask are two popular Python web frameworks. We compare them to help you decide which one suits your project best.

title: Introduction to C Programming
content: C is a fundamental programming language. In this blog, we cover basic concepts like variables, data types, and functions.

title: How to Optimize SQL Queries
content: Slow database queries can impact performance. Learn essential techniques to optimize your SQL queries for better efficiency.

title: Building a Chat Application with WebSockets
content: A step-by-step guide to building a real-time chat application using WebSockets and Python.

title: Version Control with Git
content: Git is an essential tool for developers. This blog explains Git basics, including commits, branches, and merging.

title: Understanding REST API with Django
content: REST APIs power modern web applications. Learn how to create a RESTful API using Django and Django REST Framework.

title: Getting Started with Bash Commands
content: Master the most useful Bash commands to improve your workflow and automate tasks in Linux and Windows.

title: How to Deploy a Django App
content: Deploying a Django application can be tricky. Follow this guide to deploy your app using Gunicorn and Nginx.
